Policies and Initiatives.title: Before the first missiles fly: AI, cyber & electronic warfare - how India is preparing for invisible battlefields
Policies and Initiatives.summary: India is integrating AI, cyber, and electronic warfare into its military, adopting a process-centric doctrine to enhance intelligence and surveillance. This shift aims for strategic dominance and reduced reliance on foreign technology in future conflicts. The integration is part of India's technological evolution, as seen in initiatives like Operation Sindoor.

AI Start-Up News.title: Maharashtra poised to lead Indiaâ€™s public-sector AI adoption: Wadhwani AI
AI Start-Up News.summary: Maharashtra is expected to take the lead in India's public-sector adoption of artificial intelligence, according to Wadhwani AI. The state is poised to pioneer the use of AI in the public sector, driving innovation and growth. Wadhwani AI's prediction suggests Maharashtra will set an example for other states to follow in AI adoption.
